boardgame.name: Among the Stars: Revival
boardgame.description: A new era has begun. The Alliance's attempt to revive the worlds that were destroyed during the Purge was met with great success and the future looks bright for the first time. Those sectors that were abandoned before, have now become very active and are blooming with life._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Due to the increased traffic, the construction of new Stations in the area was deemed necessary. Once again, the alien races rush to build the best Space Station, in order to take advantage of the new opportunities that arise. To that end, Advisors are being sent by the Alliance to assist in the construction._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Among the Stars: Revival, a new expansion for Among the Stars, can also be played as a standalone game for two players! This game features new mechanisms that add more interaction to the game and more things to consider when drafting a card. New elements in the game include:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 30 locations: 15 Basic and 15 Special (90 Location cards in total)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; New two-player rules: More strategic and skill-testing especially for two players! These rules can also be used for Among the Stars base game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Spaceships: A new highly-interactive mechanism used by many of the new cards. It allows the players to put Spaceship tokens on the Stations, preventing anyone from building on those spaces._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Advisors: This new module, which can also be added to the Among the Stars base game, increases competition among the players in order to control Advisor cards that grant them special abilities as well as additional victory points._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Among the Stars: Revival can also be enhanced by using the miniatures from the Among The Stars: Miniatures Pack (available separately)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: #09: Among The Stars: Revival, Steam Park on tap, Mottainai, Two Rooms _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; A Boom

listing.notes: KS edition with all stretch goals and exclusives Among the Stars: Revival – Kickstarter Stretch Goals. Also includes: Carcassonne: Gold Rush Elder Sign Quarriors Quarriors! Quartifacts Quarriors! Quest of the Qladiator Free Mage Wars: Dice Tower 2014 funding campaign promo card set

Stronghold Games (SHG8015) A new era has begun. The Alliance_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s attempt to revive the worlds that were destroyed during the Purge was met with great success and the future looks bright for the first time. Those sectors that were abandoned before, have now become very active and are blooming with life. Due to the increased traffic, the construction of new Stations in the area was deemed necessary. Once again, the alien races rush to build the best Space Station, in order to take advantage of the new opportunities that arise. To that end, Advisors are being sent by the Alliance to assist in the construction. Among the Stars: Revival is a new expansion for Among the Stars, which can also be played as a standalone game for two players!

This is a retail copy of the game. This game has been played once and is in excellent condition. The cards are sleeved with Mayday sleeves which I will include. I will ship via USPS Priority Mail. Shipping is $12
Only played once. Comes with all Kickstarter stretch goals (plastic reactors, spaceships, extra cards), and extra set of linen cards, plus card sleeves.

This includes the base game, the ambassador miniature pack and Kickstarter extras! It comes with exclusive plastic player markers, plastic reactors and a whole set of extra cards (the stretch goals from the Kickstarter). It also includes new packs of sleeves for the whole game. The game will ship within two business days of payment.

Kickstarter Edition. Includes stretch goals plus a set of plastic miniature bases (worth $10). Please contact me before buying (for shipping rates etc.) Payment: Bank transfer using IBAN/BIC (no additional cost) PayPal (+ 1,9% fees) or PayPal Friends
Item reserved for BGG user Mrdabba as won in the BPierce72 Start of Fall Auction. Actual shipping costs will be calculated and added to the purchase price.

Game is in very good condition and has been verified as complete including original instructions. Tokens are still unpunched and both decks of cards are still factory sealed! Box has light storage wear but overall the box is in very good condition. There is a game store_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s sticker on the box top as it used to be part of their game library. Cardboard box insert is also present.
